DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate RTVue measurement cornea various ocular condition include normal , pathology , post refractive surgery cataract .
DOC.criteria: Normal cornea : 18 year age old No corneal pathology No prior ocular surgery prior laser refractive surgery Post laser refractive surgery : 18 year age old No corneal pathology No prior ocular surgery except laser refractive surgery At least 1 week post laser refractive surgery without complication Corneal pathology : 18 year age old Clinical diagnosis one type corneal pathology , include corneal scar keratoconus , etc. , exclude eye corneal power measurement clinically relevant ( e.g. , eye require corneal transplant ) No prior laser refractive surgery Cataract surgery : 18 year age old No corneal pathology No prior ocular surgery , prior laser refractive surgery , prior cataract surgery Post surgery visit shall include eye without complication
